abstract: Quotes from Coach Jurgen Klinsmann and his players before the U.S. men's national team faces Ecuador at Red Bull Arena Tuesday night.
snippet: Quotes from Coach Jurgen Klinsmann and his players before the U.S. men's national team faces Ecuador at Red Bull Arena Tuesday night.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team

lead_paragraph: HARRISON, N.J. -- The United States men's national team plays Ecuador in an international friendly at Red Bull Arena on Tuesday night in the fifth game of the Jurgen Klinsmann era. Though additional matches for the rest of the year have not been announced, it is expected that the U.S. will play in Europe next month.

headline.main: Some Pregame Comments: U.S. vs. Ecuador
